title: PBE Help (Technical issue)
body: So i just got a new PBE account, and i went to install the new PBE Client for 2017, on my mac, and it did install. However, when i opened the LOLpatcher, it takes foreeeever, I even left it on for a night, and almost 6 more hours, but it made like no progress. Should i keep waiting or start it again or try to download it when the PBE is done with maintenence?

replies.body: Also, i had it opened for like 2 hours, but it's still on 2%...

"It sounds like the PBE may have installed in a directory that has some stronger security settings. As a first step, go over the steps in our permissions guide to make sure your PBE has access to open. Let me know if you have any questions!"-Porocles





---> 
I was able to reinstall the client successfully, and it even opened as is currently patching as you read this comment. However, it takes too long, so do you suggest leaving it on overnight? I have a MAC that runs all day. Thanks!

It sounds like the PBE may have installed in a directory that has some stronger security settings.  As a first step, go over the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure your PBE has access to open.  Let me know if you have any questions!
